attributes.action: Include Monday as a Weekend Day, for all scholars at State Schools in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Mr. Brown, wants to force all children to stay at school until they are 18, then we here at the British Scholars Union,  think that we deserve a longer weekend. Therefore, we propose, that Monday is included as a weekend, ans so we have 3 days instead of two, however in the long run, we will make up for the extra weekend, as we will all be forced to go to school until we are 18.
